item.title: Git notes
item.description: Notes to keep track of things I don’t do all that often. Working with git submodule Adding a submodule is very simple, here I add a theme to this site: 1 git submodule add https://github.com/monkeyWzr/hugo-theme-cactus.git themes/cactus Updating as well: 1 git submodule update --remote --merge Removing, not so much, the long version (google-fu): Delete the relevant section from the .gitmodules file. Stage the .
